snippet.title: Make It Stop! Gameplay (Endless/Hard Mode)
snippet.description:
'Make It Stop!' is a fast paced shooting game which takes place inside the human body. Your are tasked to pilot remote controlled ships to fend off an invading virus. With every enemy you destroy, the attacks get faster and heavier.

This is a short 4 minute recording showing the earlier stages of the game being played on 'Endless/Hard' mode. This provides the player with only one life to see how far they can get.

Later enemies will have a lot more projectiles fired at you at a much faster rate of speed.

Available on the Epic Games Store: Mar 08, 2024

www.ChubbyBubbleGames.com
